a.style: font-family:'Playfair Display', Georgia, 'Times New Roman', 'Liberation Serif', serif

text.tspan:
The Living Planet Index (LPI) measures the average decline in monitored wildlife
populations
. The index value
measures the change in abundance in 34,836 populations across 5,495 native species relative to the year
Data source: World Wildlife Fund and Zoological Society of London (2024)
